I remember this game fondly. When it came out, I downloaded the demo and played it on my shitty Sony desktop at an eye-sizzling 5 frames per second. Later I would finally play it on the console PS3 port. This was 4 years ago, but I enjoyed it.

When I became a man and upgraded to a proper gaming PC with an ass-devastating 9800 GT graphics card, I re-tried this. Daaaamn this game is overrated as fuck. Stop sucking this game's dick. It's all right.

One of the best first person shooters of all time. The pacing in HL2 is fa-nominal. But be aware unless your prepared to stop and think you will not enjoy the half life series.  These games are all about physics puzzles and quick reflexes. However in turn you get a fascinating continuation from the first  game and some of the greatest game play mechanics in recent memory.
This Honestly has to be the best game i have ever played.
This is a great game! Crowbar, Hovercraft, Alien-Zombiethingys what more do you need to know?!
"Bla, bla, bla Mr. Freeman"

Right up there for the best FPS list ever, if you are a old school PC gamer you know the importance of this title. For those more new to the PC world this is a title that did not do too well when later released on the consoles, why was this??? simply because even newer console hardware could not run this title to the required potential. This set the standard for modern PC FPS titles gave great characters, a solid story with a good lengh rarely in shooters these days & puzzles which added to the mix. Will we ever see a HL3??? well as the bar was set so high with this...maybe it is just too much for the developers.
By FAR one of my favorite games EVER!
half life 2 is really fun and i recommend you guys get it! VALVE Is awesome! what more could be said?

This game was made in, like, the 1800's or something.  It's so linear and you don't rank up when you get the headshots.  And these long pauses when the NPC have these mile long dialogue readings?  It takes forever and it won't let you progress in the game until they're done.  One time I waited for a NPC to finish speaking only to find my Mountain Dew was flat and warm and my Doritos had gone stale.

The best game I've ever played, hands down. Even after beating this game numerous  times I still find myself completely enthralled by every aspect of this Valve masterpiece.

You fill the mute shoes of the theoretical physicist Dr. Gordon Freeman who, under contract from the mysterious G-Man, is thrust into the dystopian City 17 and the headquarters of the Combine Overwatch that rule over Earth and all of its citizens after a crushing victory over the human race in the accurately named "7-Hour War". Now it's up to Gordon and Alyx to lead the human resistance against Dr. Breen and his solders outfitted with high-tech, para-dimensional Combine technology. 

In true Valve fashion, Half-Life 2 is an amazing First Person Shooter with highly inventive weapons like the Overwatch Standard Issue Pulse Rifle (OSIPR), Antlion Bug Bait, and the famous Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator (or "Gravity Gun" for short). Unlike other shooters, HL2 knows how to pace itself; allowing you to become immersed in the world it weaves around you before handing you your iconic crowbar and letting you off the chain. The battles are also broken up by simple, yet entertaining, physics puzzles along with some vehicle sections and exploration that rewards you with bonus weapons and ammo. 

The characters are amazing in their own right too. While Gordon remains speechless to allow the player to project onto him, all of the other entities posses their own amazing personalities. From the quirky Dr. Kleiner to the alien Vortigaunts that aid the resistance, every character has their own story to tell, even if it's only for an instant as they get killed off by a different character with their own interesting backstory. Or by an Ant Lion, that happens a lot too. 

If you have yet to play Half-Life 2 or the original Half-Life, then you are missing out. It's time to wake up, Mister Freeman. Wake up and smell the ashes...

This is, without a shadow of a doubt, one of the greatest games I have ever played in my life. I went into this game sceptical and sure that it wouldnt live up to the hype. It actually exceeded it. Wow. Just... wow. Well played Valve.

Great game. Fun gameplay, awesome setting/atmosphere, cool soundtrack, and a killer story. This is what single-player games should strive to achieve. Who cares if Freeman doesnt talk, he's so much of a badass he doesn't need to.

Это Игра-легенда. После первой части казалось что сделать лучше невозможно... Но не для Valve. 
Сколько она получила премий как игра года, думаю не сможет уже сосчитать никто :))) 
Невероятное разнообразие геймплея - от боев в подземельях до боев в городе полном зомби (ревенхольм респект!!!) и военных базах. Отличная графика, отличный дизайн уровней, классная озвучка (особенно ambient - звуки), отлично проработанные и "живые" персонажи ,которым веришь... Вообщем MUST PLAY! Если еще есть такие люди ,которые в нее не играли :)

I found Half-Life 2 to be a great sequel to the original Half-Life games. Although I found the storytelling techniques and overall plotline of the original series to be more compelling, the gameplay of this follow-up series makes for a very enjoyable FPS, perhaps more "fun" than the original.

After 14 hours I can clearly say that this is a game unlike the others. The fast-paced action and the gameplay flow is flawless. You never get the feeling that the game is linear, even though you can't call the levels open either. There's a perfect balance between exploring and shooting in Half-Life 2.

If you don't own this game you are missing out! It is a great action-fps game with an amazing story. Don't worry, it's not 100% nececary to play the first one before this one, as you will only miss a few references. It has great game mechanics, combat is awsome, and on harder difficulties, very challenging. One of the best single-player games on the planet!

Sorry if you were interested in exploring any kind of aftermath of the Black Mesa incident.

Der Freeman ist zurück aus Black Mesa und verbreitet noch mehr Chaos! Dieses mal gegen die Alieninvasoren, die sich die Combine nennen und sich die Welt Untertan gemacht haben. Wird der Freeman es schaffen ihre verruchten Pläne zu vereiteln? Natürlich wird er das, aber IHR müsst ihm dabei helfen. Zögert keine Sekunde mehr. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Half-Life 2 ist ein total spannendes und erlebnisreiches Spiel, in dem ihr viel entdecken könnt und noch mehr kaputt machen könnt. Das Spiel ist sehr abwechslungsreich und macht sehr viel Spaß. Auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen, falls Ihr euch mal langweilt und nicht wisst, was ihr spielen sollt.

Beautiful, stylish, thought-provoking. Half-Life 2 reinvents what you can expect from a video game.

An incredible journey through a dystopian world so potent that only Valve could create it. Tight gameplay, solid sound/music and an immersive story that relieves much of the tedium from the "going from point A to point B" game style that is present. If you like a well-rounded shooter with all the elements of a dystopian/scifi masterwork of a story, Half Life 2 is the quintessential game. You owe it to yourself to play this; even if you're just a mere FPS fan.

Half-Life 2 continues the unique story after the Black Mesa Incident. After the dubbed, Seven Hour War, Sthe "One Free Man" arrives to tie up loose ends that he is semi - responsible for.  Half-Life 2 contines the action-packed adventure of the story of Earth and its' forces to overcome and prove that one-hundred years of inventing the windmill is no pathway to total destruction.
No doubt, one of the very best games ever, period.

Что Вы чувствуете, когда запускаете любимую игру? Наверное, это неповторимое чувство... играя в такую игру, ты хочешь встать на место ГГ - повторять его манеры поведения, действия, цитаты... а быть может, ты желаешь пробежаться по полюбившимся местам? Скажем, тот самый дальний район города... да, трущобы и заброшенные шахты. О да, о таком можно было и не мечтать. Такие игры навсегда впечатаются в память, в них всегда хочется играть, к ним обязательно возвращаются, о них говорят. Half-Life 2 как раз тот самый пример в моей личной практике, когда игра неизменно хороша и актуальна даже спустя много лет. Она действительно заслуживает самой высокой оценки.
